summary: THE DRIVERS DOOR WILL LOCK AND UNLOCK, THOUGH IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO OPEN THE DOOR.  IT WILL NOT OPEN FROM THE INSIDE OR THE OUTSIDE HANDLE.  THE ELECTRONIC LOCK FOB WILL LOCK AND UNLOCK THE CAR.  THE KEY WILL LOCK AND UNLOCK THE CAR.  ENTRY AND EXIT MUST BE DONE BY CLIMBING OVER THE CENTER CONSOLE AND GOING THROUGH THE PASSENGER DOOR.  THIS IS A MAJOR HAZARD TO THE DRIVER AND FELLOW PASSENGERS.  IF WE SHOULD BE INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT WITH MY TWO YOUNG BOYS IN THE CAR, I WILL NOT BE ABLE TO HELP THEM EXIT THE CAR UNTIL I HAVE CLIMBED OVER THE CENTER CONSOLE AND EXITED THROUGH THE PASSENGER DOOR.  HELP!!!!!!!!  THIS IS DEFINITELY A MAJOR SAFETY ISSUE RELATED TO THE KIA BRAND OF CARS.  ALL OVER THE INTERNET IT IS DISCUSSED HOW THIS PROBLEM HAS BECOME A PROBLEM FOR ALL TYPES OF KIA MODELS.  *TR
